title: Director of Digital Marketing - eCommerce - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: The Director of Digital Marketing is responsible for steering, managing and optimizing our Acquisition and Retention activities. This person will lead the Digital Marketing team to drive traffic...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
